definitions: a Spanish method of producing wine, especially sherry and Madeira, whereby small amounts of younger wines stored in an upper tier of casks are systematically blended with the more mature wine in the casks below.
shortDefinitions: Spanish method of producing wine whereby small amounts of younger wines are systematically blended with more mature wine

definitions: a blend of sherry or Malaga wine produced by the solera system.
shortDefinitions: blend of sherry or Malaga wine produced by solera system

definitions: a wine cask, typically one with a capacity of four hogsheads, on the bottom tier of the solera system and containing the oldest wine.
shortDefinitions: wine cask on bottom tier of solera system
